info.name: Dark Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)
info.description: A dark theme for Mozilla Add-ons (AMO). For suggestions, contribution, or trying the latest development version, please check out the project on GitLab.

data.title: Dark Mozilla Add-ons (AMO): Not working with Stylus. But working with Stylish 2.1.1 !
Works, but needs a small fix (fully open Discussion to read more)
